text: @realDonaldTrump I wish you were more concerned about stopping the spread of COVID19 in our country and saving American lives than you are with stopping the destruction of inanimate objects! 😡 #TREA45ON 🇺🇸🇺🇸 #Biden2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸 #TrumpForPrison2021
